tool.name: MACSE: Align coding sequences
tool.description: Align coding sequences using AA translation
tool.command:
alignSequences.py -l $log -i $input -o $output
#if ($gctype.gc=="sc") -g "1" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="vmc") -g "2" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="ymc") -g "3" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="mpcmcmsc") -g "4" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="imc") -g "5" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="cdhnc") -g "6" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="efmc") -g "9" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="enc") -g "10" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="bappc") -g "11" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="aync") -g "12" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="amc") -g "13" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="afmc") -g "14" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="bnc") -g "15" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="cmc") -g "16" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="tmc") -g "21" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="somc") -g "22" #end if #if ($gctype.gc=="thmc") -g "23" #end if

param.name: gc
param.label: Genetic code
param.option: Mold Protozoan and Coelenterate Mitochondrial Code and the Mycoplasma Spiroplasma Code
Ciliate Dasycladacean and Hexamita Nuclear Code
Bacterial Archaeal and Plant Plastid Code

tool.help:
**Note**
MACSE is a program to align coding sequences using AA translation.
Source code of MACSE can be downloaded, using the svn facilities of redmine with the following command line and "guest" as login and password:
svn checkout http://kimura.univ-montp2.fr/svn/macse
----
